summary: A complete set of stylish light samurai armour, and other goodies..
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=cccc33][size=7]Samurai Light Armors[/size][/color]

For dragonslaying with style, I present five complete sets of light Samurai armor.
All components are enchantable and can be forged and tempered.[/center]

Not a replacer. Advanced Armors perk required. Samurai Armor will appear in forging list under Steel. If you like it, please endorse.
I will continue working on this and add more content over time.

If you would like the armor to be less glossy, open the mesh files in nifskope and darken the specularity color.

Updates:
     Added silver armor with matching katana and shield.

Be sure to copy the textures and meshes to the appropriate folders:

Data > textures > armor >
Data > textures > weapons
Data > meshes > armor >
Data > meshes > weapons


Enjoy!


Check out my other mods:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=19752]UDO[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=18827]Dark Assassin Armor[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29934]Economy Overhaul[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=17666]Follower and NPC Overhaul[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=18032]Hadrian\'s lair[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=19192]Genom Races[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=17295]Hjerim Deluxe[/url]
author: EnigManic

files.name: Samurai Light Armors
files.changelogHtml:
Retextured armors so tops and bottoms match and reduced glossiness.
Retextured shield.
Added a one-handed katana.
Updated crafting recipes so armors appear under Steel instead of Misc.
